_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.9:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in practicing persistently for it
Another meditator who is skilled in persistently practicing for immersion but not in attaining it
Another meditator who is skilled in both persistently practicing for immersion and attaining it, but not in emerging from it
Another meditator who is skilled in emerging from immersion.
